name: SCNParticleSortingMode
desc: Options for the rendering order of particles, used by the sortingMode property.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Particles are not sorted; they may be rendered in any order.

items.name: case projectedDepth
items.desc: Particles farther from the point of view (as measured using projected depth) are rendered before closer particles.

items.name: case distance
items.desc: Particles farther from the point of view (as measured using distance from the camera in scene space) are rendered before closer particles.

items.name: case oldestFirst
items.desc: Particles emitted earlier are rendered before particles emitted more recently.

items.name: case youngestFirst
items.desc: Particles emitted more recently are rendered before particles emitted earlier.
